name: rosbag_info
description:
This Action extracts metadata from rosbag files.

By default, a hidden json dotfile will be produced and rendered as .bag file metadata in Roboto.

parameters.name: SPLIT
parameters.description: Save per-rosbag metadata json file next to each rosbag. The naming convention is {rosbag_name}.json.

parameters.name: FILE_NAME
parameters.description: Output file name. Only relevant if --split is not used
